title: The Best Of Terrible Tommy And Yucky Chucky
description: The best of Terrible Tommy and Yucky Chucky jokes, quips, tidbits, one liners, and genuine humor. Two kids with rapier tongues and nasty antics wrestle with the foibles of growing up and dealing with parents, teachers, church, friends, enemies, and unsuspecting strangers. Truly timeless jokes and jocularity on every page.
author: Thomas F. Shubnell
